title: U.S. sanctions Russians for election meddling, cyber attacks
text:
U.S. sanctions Russians for election meddling, cyber attacks Thursday, March 15, 2018 - 02:36 
The United States announced sanctions on Thursday against 19 Russian individuals and five groups over malicious cyber activity including meddling in the 2016 U.S. election.   
The United States announced sanctions on Thursday against 19 Russian individuals and five groups over malicious cyber activity including meddling in the 2016 U.S. election.  //reut.rs/2IsBP8V
